mapper.select: SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, USERNICK,PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTO_1,PHOTO_2,PHOTO_3,PHOTO_4, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE PERMISSION = 1

SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, USERNICK,PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTO_1,PHOTO_2,PHOTO_3,PHOTO_4, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE (USERNO=#{loginNo} AND PERMISSION = 0) OR (PERMISSION = 1) OR (USERNO IN (SELECT FRIEND FROM FRIEND WHERE USERNO=#{loginNo}) AND PERMISSION = 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNS(SNSNO, USERNO, USERNICK,PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTO_1,PHOTO_2,PHOTO_3,PHOTO_4, WRITEDATE) VALUES (SNS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo},#{userNick}, #{permission}, #{content}, 0,#{photoCount}, #{photo_1},#{photo_2},#{photo_3},#{photo_4}, SYSDATE)
